about.description: A python package for defensive data analysis.
about.summary: A python package for defensive data analysis.

name: engarde
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "engarde" %}
{% set version = "0.3.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "70df13ed1470d099b359c514f8da6835ce5645c8f79b3edd537f641a8699e1db" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - numpy x.x
    - pandas
  run:
    - python
    - numpy x.x
    - pandas
test:
  imports:
    - engarde

about:
  home: https://github.com/tomaugspurger/engarde
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A python package for defensive data analysis.'
  description: |
    A python package for defensive data analysis.
  doc_url: http://engarde.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/tomaugspurger/engarde

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - TomAugspurger
    - phobson
